description: This Java source file defines a Spring Boot REST controller named HelloController that handles basic endpoints for a note-taking backend application. It provides endpoints for a welcome message, API documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A Spring Boot REST controller providing basic endpoints such as welcome message, documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message for the application.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects the user to the Swagger UI for API documentation.
